distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libvirt fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-3639: cpu: add support for 'ssbd' and 'virt-ssbd' CPUID feature bits pass through (bsc#1092885)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and speculative execution of memory reads before the addresses of all prior memory writes are known may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis, aka Speculative Store Bypass (SSB), Variant 4.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
